column2: "Kyo, that was unfair! Why didn't you stop even after I asked?!"
"Hmhmhm, unfairness is a perfect fit. The path I take to reach my goals matters not... If I can force a resolution, I will."
"That's going too far... Do you not care about my feelings at all? Kyo, you...jerk!"
"...Halt. Why am I the target of a gaze as cold as absolute zero? Why do you bear such animosity towards me."
"Kyo's in the wrong here. Isn't he? <%me>?"
"Kyo is at fault."
"You're both at fault."
"Impossible... Could I have made a mistake...?"
"Y-You're right... I'm sorry for making such a scene in public..."
"...I should explain what happened. Earlier, I headed to Amduscia for a Corrupted Dragonkin suppression."
"The monsters were extremely tough... But I intended to face them head on, fighting to the bitter end in the name of justice."
"...Foolishness. What exactly did that earn you...?"
"My allies were... gravely wounded. I was only focused on what was ahead of me. When I was attacked from behind, they covered me..."
"I lost my focus, and I wasn't keeping up my attacks... But the enemies were struck down one by one... and the battle ended."
"Kyo had used his decay Phantom ability. Even though I told him not to..."
"What of it? Your orders were to eliminate the Dragonkin. It had nothing to do with \"justice\"."
"The fault lies with you, whose obsession with what comprises \"justice\" caused others injury. Is that what a Hero should do?"
"T-That's... not..."

"Heroes protect people with the power of
\"justice\". They never give up... That is your conviction. However, strong convictions weaken the heart."
"Could your heart endure a situation where you're faced with being unable to save a beloved one with your \"justice\"?"
"\"Justice\" has clouded your vision... You must become capable of deciding for yourself what is correct."
"You must protect your own heart. I do not wish to bear witness to that again..."
"Kyo... don't worry. I'm not the same person I was back then."
"When I can't get by on my justice, I'll be saved by yours... I know that."
"Well then... <%me>, I apologize for causing a commotion! Until we meet again!"
